title: FatFork
author: FatFork
created_time: August 10, 2022, 10:24:23 PMLast edit: August 15, 2022, 09:07:53 AM by FatFork
content: EDIT:Based on all the evidence, I tagged their account and created a Newbie warning (Type 1) Flag against user AthosMeta: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;flag=3019Please support if you agree.What happened: ATHOS META [ATM] is yet another project with plagiarized content in the whitepaper and some other red flags.Profile Link: AthosMetaANN thread: [ANN] ATHOS META - UNBLOCK YOUR CHAIN ENLARGE YOUR POCKET [archived]Website: https://athos-meta.io/ [archived]Quote from: https://whois.domaintools.com/athos-meta.io112 days oldCreated on 2022-04-20Expires on 2024-04-20Updated on 2022-04-25Whitepaper: https://athos-meta.io/Whitepaper.pdf [archived]Red Flag #1: Plagiarized Content   Original source: https://www.cardanofuondation.org/en/our-missions/The disclaimer in their whitepaper is also completely copied from other sources.Red Flag #2: Unrealistic ROIThey offer unrealistic and ridiculous annual percentage yield (up to 165%) and interest rates on staking (up to 25% per month)...... and also, a ponzi-like referral scheme.Red Flag #3: Intellectual property infringementThey use other people's intellectual property for their marketing purposes without the author's permission.(used in their whitepaper and second ANN thread)That screenshot is actually taken from the game BanCa Fishing by Gila Studio.Quote from: https://gila-studio.com/terms/All rights, title and interest in and to the Service (including without limitation any games, titles, computer code, themes, objects, characters, character names, stories, dialogue, catch phrases, concepts, artwork, animations, sounds, musical compositions, audio-visual effects, methods of operation, moral rights, documentation, in-game chat transcripts, character profile information, recordings of games played using a Gila game client, and the Gila game clients and server software) are owned by Gila. Gila reserves all rights, including without limitation, all intellectual property rights or other proprietary rights, in connection with its games and the Service.

comments.author: faetos
comments.body: Wash, rinse and repeat - even reading the plagiarized content is a bunch of gibberish. What is any of that really mean? Do they have a github? What did they fork this off of? Good hunting on this one, FF. Hopefully, folks don't get pulled in if it's phony.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: OP, you can probably create an actual flag for this user, you confused me a little with so many flags in your report, but without a flag for support.  If he AthosMeta started the business with plagiarism, cannot expect any honourable work behind everything so, it should be marked and neg. tagged.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: Last night I did a search on this project, and I was planning to make a report today,  but the OP was quicker to uncover so it's much better to know.Waiting for a response from AthosMeta as the representative of this project.Little did I catch

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on August 11, 2022, 11:30:43 AMOP, you can probably create an actual flag for this user, you confused me a little with so many flags in your report, but without a flag for support.  I didn't think of that. LOL! I will still wait a little longer for the representative of this project to respond before I decide to create a Flag against them, also, I have contacted the Gila Studio developers and we will see what they have to say about the use of their intellectual property.Quote from: examplens on August 11, 2022, 11:30:43 AMIf he AthosMeta started the business with plagiarism, cannot expect any honourable work behind everything so, it should be marked and neg. tagged.Yes, it's all just a hype-word marketing full of terms like yield farming, staking, AI bot trading, Meta(verse), P2E gaming, NFT... Basically, everything they could think of is in there! I'll update this report soon with new information and additional red flags about their parent "company" Athos Meta Capital.

comments.author: Bounty Star
comments.body: Thanks op. ANN Thread is locked as well. I will close the bounty campaign too.

comments.author: AthosMeta
comments.body: Thanks for your review.We are very delighted that our project are expanding in many crypto communities and are paid a lot of attentions from usersThe crypto field has general terms and there are  thousands of projects being born everyday, we think this is not a big problem to analyze. When we blend ourself in this market, we took Cardano as our goal to strive and we work night and day to achieve our targetsRegarding the game field, we have experienced it for 10 years, and there are thousands of game versions similar to us nowaday. Fishing Games are very popular in people's lives, we have implemented many game projects and gained a lot of good reputation. And now we want to apply this game to P2E blockchain model so that we can bring more benefits to users based on the clever ATM tokenomicsAs far as we know, Gila Studio persists in the belief that this is their game product. Indeed they copied and imitated our products on the app store so many times. Please read our game information here https://docs.athos-meta.io/ecosystem/p2e-fishing-game, we believe that this product will put a new brick in the crypto game market. Stay tuned with us for upcoming news

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: Quote from: Bounty Star on August 11, 2022, 04:32:58 PMThanks op. ANN Thread is locked as well. I will close the bounty campaign too. It is important to research about the project before launching any campaign, if you could have done the minimum research then you would not have seen anything like this. Whenever you get an offer to manage a bounty campaign, you should not accept it blindly without doing some research. It is unfortunate that many copy content projects are allowed to do their marketing in this forum due to unprofessional managers.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: AthosMeta on August 11, 2022, 05:09:33 PMWhen we blend ourself in this market, we took Cardano as our goal to strive and we work night and day to achieve our targetsIt seems you took more than just that from Cardano project. You have used identical sentences from their materials, and you have incorporated them into your content. This is called plagiarism.Quote from: AthosMeta on August 11, 2022, 05:09:33 PMRegarding the game field, we have experienced it for 10 years, and there are thousands of game versions similar to us nowaday. Fishing Games are very popular in people's lives, we have implemented many game projects and gained a lot of good reputation. And now we want to apply this game to P2E blockchain model so that we can bring more benefits to users based on the clever ATM tokenomicsI'd like to see some proof of that. Where is your team? Where can I find your previous work? Where is your portfolio or code repository?Quote from: AthosMeta on August 11, 2022, 05:09:33 PMAs far as we know, Gila Studio persists in the belief that this is their game product. Indeed they copied and imitated our products on the app store so many times. So you claim that they actually stole your product? A bold claim, but I'm skeptical. Can you back this up with evidence? I can see their game is quite popular on Google Play Store, where can I find yours? Anyway, I have forwarded this information to Gila Studio, awaiting their response.

comments.author: Bounty Star
comments.body: Quote from: ScamViruS on August 12, 2022, 08:31:43 PMQuote from: Bounty Star on August 11, 2022, 04:32:58 PMThanks op. ANN Thread is locked as well. I will close the bounty campaign too. It is important to research about the project before launching any campaign, if you could have done the minimum research then you would not have seen anything like this. Whenever you get an offer to manage a bounty campaign, you should not accept it blindly without doing some research. It is unfortunate that many copy content projects are allowed to do their marketing in this forum due to unprofessional managers.ScamViruS, Previously we did a research about this project, They recently (August 10, 2022) updated their wp.

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: Quote from: Bounty Star on August 13, 2022, 08:03:29 AMQuote from: ScamViruS on August 12, 2022, 08:31:43 PMQuote from: Bounty Star on August 11, 2022, 04:32:58 PMThanks op. ANN Thread is locked as well. I will close the bounty campaign too. It is important to research about the project before launching any campaign, if you could have done the minimum research then you would not have seen anything like this. Whenever you get an offer to manage a bounty campaign, you should not accept it blindly without doing some research. It is unfortunate that many copy content projects are allowed to do their marketing in this forum due to unprofessional managers.ScamViruS, Previously we did a research about this project, They recently (August 10, 2022) updated their wp.If you have researched the right way, then how can you take the wrong step of launching a bounty campaign for a half-finished wp project? And you didn't check when they updated wp? You should look into these aspects before managing any bounty campaigns in the future, because if you make mistakes over and over again, it will take your reputation to a very bad level.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: As I mentioned before, here is more information about ATHOS META's parent company, Athos Meta Capital.Website: https://athos-meta.capital/ [archived]Red Flag #4: Domain is less than three months oldQuote from: https://whois.domaintools.com/athos-meta.capital81 days oldCreated on 2022-05-24Expires on 2023-05-24Updated on 2022-05-29Although the copyright notice in the footer of the website says ©2018.Red Flag #5: Plagiarized contentSpeaking of copyright, most of the content on the website is plagiarized from various sources. This is only a sample: Original source: https://labs.binance.com/ Original source: https://blackmamba.ventures/There is more plagiarism than this, of course.Red Flag #6: A non-existent companyThey pretend to be a legitimate business but are actually a non-existent company. Apart from the fake phone number and email address, no other contact information were found on their website. There is no address, no physical location, no company registration, nothing.Based on all the evidence, I tagged their account and created a Newbie warning (Type 1) Flag against user AthosMeta: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;flag=3019Please support if you agree.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Red Flag #7: Their website is almost identical to the template demoI just wanted to share some more information about the Athos Meta Capital website and to show how lazy these scammers really are. Their website is almost identical to the template demo from Themeforest. They didn't even bother to change the images used in the demo, including client/partner logos in the footer. Considering that most of the content is plagiarized, they probably made the entire website in less than 15 minutes. This is not something you would expect from a company that claims to have more than 10 years of experience in the financial business and a massive capital available to invest in potential projects. Original source (Financo Theme Demo): https://19899805.hs-sites.com/en-us/financo/home
